description: Tara Lynn can't finish her exam because of stomach pain. A visit to nurse Lorelei puts her in an uncomfortable position where she must strip down and take an enema. The nurse accuses her of lying and sends Tara back to finish the exam. Professor Davis decides to scrap the test and punish this lying slut for wasting his time. Lot's of deep anal action and solo footage included!
title: Enemas Don't Lie
